metadata.creator: Andrew Fish
metadata.description: Vicious is a metal band out of Lindsey CA. They have been a band for a short time now. In that time they wrote and recorded an EP called "The Beginning"In this interview you'll hear the band talking about their music and the bands history. We also get into their writing and recording. The future is bright for this band.
